attributes.action: Get SCS company get rid of their ad that stats line dancing is embarrassing
attributes.additional_details: WE WANT THEM TO REMOVE THIS AD AND SEND OUT A HUGE  apology to everybody it has offended
attributes.background:
SCS have a radio add that stats......... 
 Linedancing REALLY?? There's less embarrassing ways to Spice Up Your Life … Shop At SCS

For people all over the UK that line dances this is a very big  insult that has outraged a lot of us
